attributes.action: Prohibit Brian Moore from Rugby Match Commentary
attributes.additional_details:
This house believes that Brian Moore no longer meets the necessary standard, set by a general level of decency to fellow human kind, to participate in the BBC's Rugby match day commentary.

He should not be paid a share of the Government's TV - license fee.

If Mr Moore feels he does meet the standard worthy of his inclusion in the commentary team, it shall be put to a general public vote.

On a more personal level and as one of several million people who participate to his salary, I do not enjoy his biased, arrogant, hard-lined, belittling, sarcastic and disparaging remarks.

Please help me rid him from rugby commentary.
